item.title: Python Stuff
item.description: In this course I learned some basic Python practices. This post shows some examples of code using R, Python, and R/Python interactions. First here’s how R and Python interact with reticulate(). #R CHUNK UT <- "hook" library(reticulate) #PYTHON CHUNK y = "'em" print(r.UT,y) ## hook 'em #R again cat(c(UT,py$y)) ## hook 'em Now, I will look at how to do Strings in Python for fun! Here’s a simple string:
